alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Irwin, northwestern Berrien and central Ben Hill Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Fitzgerald to 6 miles north of Alapaha. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ocilla, Enigma, Mystic, Lulaville, Gladys, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Bowens Mill, Pinetta, Abba and Queensland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
